title: Brand New Computer Lags
body:
Hey Guys,

I just got a new computer about a week ago. For some reason, League will spike and my MS goes up to 400. I don't know why this is happening. I checked our internet speed and that's fine...my computer is the HP Envy with i7 7th gen processor, windows 10 and has NVIDIA GEFORCE card. Also, I cant find anything online about the NA servers. 

Any ideas?

Frustrated ADC, 

Shane

replies.body: With a new computer, it's important to make sure all of your drivers and settings are tuned up and updated.  It's equally important to make sure your network is keeping a strong connection and able to maintain a comms specifically with the game server.  I suggest using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure everything is set up to keep you in game!  Let me know if you have any questions.
